com.linecorp.armeria.client.tracing

Class HttpTracingClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.DecoratingClient<I,O,I,O>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.client.SimpleDecoratingClient<I,O>
        • com.linecorp.armeria.client.tracing.AbstractTracingClient<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
          • com.linecorp.armeria.client.tracing.HttpTracingClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>

    public class HttpTracingClient
extends AbstractTracingClient<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
    Decorates a Client to trace outbound HttpRequests using Zipkin.

    This decorator puts trace data into HTTP headers. The specifications of header names and its values correspond to Zipkin.
